description: ML Kit OCR extracts no text from chart image despite visible indicators. Affects QuantraVision context analysis accuracy.
commonCauses: Image contrast too low for text detection
Text size too small for recognition
Rotated or skewed text not detected
Font style incompatible with ML Kit
solutions: Apply image preprocessing: contrast enhancement, sharpening
Use higher resolution for OCR region
Crop specific regions with text before OCR
Apply adaptive thresholding to improve contrast
Use deskewing before OCR if needed
Validate image quality before OCR attempt
prevention: Capture charts at high resolution for OCR
Test OCR with various chart styles and themes
Crop legend and indicator areas precisely
Validate image quality metrics before processing
examples: val cropped = Imgproc.resize(roi, Size(roi.width * 2.0, roi.height * 2.0)) // Upscale
relatedErrors: Empty text blocks from ML Kit
